title: fens_presentation_fipar-c71001-09_2
text: TITLE OF PRESENTATION Figures Table 2 Chart Table 1 Company Information GENERAL INSTRUCTIONS A) PURPOSE The presentations serve two-fold purpose and allow the opportunity to present internships carried out by the students. The content of experience gained during the internship will be shared with other students, and faculty. B) FORMAT FOR PRESENTATAION (Dimensions of Panel to be provided to each student or group: Width=65cm; Height=176cm) ₃ TITLE OF PRESENTATION: Prepare a title banner for the p resentation including; (You can use Title Presentation Format Presentation (Title Section) Template-2003.ppt) - PROJ 302 SUMMER INTERNSHIP - FACULTY: ENGINERING AND NATURAL SCIENCES (FENS) - PROGRAM: ……………………………………………. - NAME – SURNAME OF STUDENT: ………………… - COMPANY/ORGANIZATION NAME: ……………… - PERIOD OF INTERNSHIP: …………………………… ₃ SUMMARY: This section gives the focus of the internship and the short description of the project. ₃ COMPANY INFO ₃ FIGURES, TABLES, AND CHARTS WITH BRIEF TEXT EXPLANATIONS: Provide graph and text explanations of your internship. The presentation should be legible from a specific distance These are general guidelines, not rules. Be creative and prepare your own presentation. You may use Microsoft PowerPoint, Word, PhotoShop or any other graphical/text software. FIPAR-C71001-09
